Rulings.Base: 1. The effect to destroy targets 1 Spell or Trap Card your opponent controls.\n2. If "Worm Solid" is destroyed by a card's effect before the end of the Damage Step, such as the effect of "D.D. Warrior Lady", the effect to destroy a Spell or Trap Card still activates as long as your opponent took Battle Damage.

PSCT.Base: This card gains 100 DEF for each Reptile-Type "Worm" monster in your Graveyard. If your opponent takes Battle Damage from attacking this card, at the end of the Damage Step select 1 Spell or Trap Card your opponent controls, and destroy it.
